protocol.text: Expression data were generated by Affymetrix Expression Console software version1.1. For the normalization, RMA (Robust Multi-Average) algorithm implemented in Affymetrix Expression Console software was used. To reduce noise for the significance analysis, probe sets that were not present by the MAS5 detection call in over 50% of the samples in at least one sample group were filtered out. ID_REF =  VALUE = RMA(Robust Multi-array Average) Normalization

20 days old Arabidopsis plants were transferred to noiseless chamber and subjected to different frequency (250Hz, 500Hz, 1000Hz, 2000Hz, and 3000Hz) of sound wave at 80 dB for 1 hour. Control sample was kept in the same noisless chamber without sound for 1 hr.
Arabidopsis thaliana ecotypes Columbia (Col-0) plants were grown under continuous light (~150±10 µmol m-2 s-1) at 22C in growth room. Seeds were stratified in cold (4C) and dark for 2 days.
Total RNA was extracted with the RNeasy Plant Mini kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer’s instruction.
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 6 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).
Following fragmentation, cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip® arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
GeneChips were scanned using the Genechip Array scanner 3000 7G (Affymetrix).
